TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit OdbcDataReader extends System.Data.Common.DbDataReader
Public NotInheritable Class OdbcDataReader Inherits DbDataReader
public ref class OdbcDataReader sealed : System::Data::Common::DbDataReader

summary.span: 提供自資料來源讀取順向資料流的資料列的方法。

span.span: Provides a way of reading a forward-only stream of data rows from a data source.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要建立，您必須呼叫方法物件，而不是直接使用建構函式。To create an , you must call the method of the object, instead of directly using a constructor. 雖然正在使用中，相關聯忙於處理，並可以對任何其他作業以外關閉它。While the is being used, the associated is busy serving the , and no other operations can be performed on the other than closing it. 這是之前，這個情況方法呼叫。This is the case until the method of the is called. 比方說，您無法擷取輸出參數，直到您呼叫之後。For example, you cannot retrieve output parameters until after you call . 結果集，另一個處理序或執行緒正在讀取資料時，所做的變更可能會顯示使用者的。Changes made to a result set by another process or thread while data is being read may be visible to the user of the . 不過，精確的行為是驅動程式和相依的時間。However, the precise behavior is both driver and timing dependent. 和屬性之後，您可以呼叫已關閉。 and are the only properties that you can call after the is closed. 有時候，您必須呼叫才能呼叫。Sometimes, you must call before you can call . ## Examples 下列範例會建立、 ，和。The following example creates an , an , and an . 此範例會讀取整個資料，並將它寫出至主控台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最後，範例會關閉，然後。Finally, the example closes the , and then the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataReader#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataReader/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataReader#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataReader/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Overrides Sub Close ()
public: override void Close();

summary.span: 關閉 物件。

span.span: Closes the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您必須明確呼叫方法，當您完成使用使用相關聯用於其他用途。You must explicitly call the method when you are finished using the to use the associated for any other purpose. > [!CAUTION] > 請勿呼叫`Close`或`Dispose`連線、 DataReader 或在任何其他 managed 的物件上`Finalize`類別的方法。Do not call `Close` or `Dispose` on a Connection, a DataReader, or any other managed object in the `Finalize` method of your class. 在完成項中，您應該只需釋放類別直接擁有的 unmanaged 的資源。In a finalizer, you should only release unmanaged resources that your class owns directly. 如果類別未擁有任何 Unmanaged 資源，請不要在類別定義中包含 `Finalize` 方法。If your class does not own any unmanaged resources, do not include a `Finalize` method in your class definition. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[回收](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md)。For more information, see [Garbage Collection](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/index.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立、 ，和。The following example creates an , an , and an . 此範例會讀取整個資料，並將它寫出至主控台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最後，範例會關閉，然後。Finally, the example closes the , and then the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData IDataReader.Read Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 最外層的資料表深度為零。The outermost table has a depth of zero.

summary.span: 取得目前資料列中的資料行數目。

span.span: Gets the number of columns in the current row.

value.span: 當未置於有效的資料錄集中時，則為 0，否則為目前資料錄中的資料行數目。

span.span: When not positioned in a valid record set, 0; otherwise the number of columns in the current record.
The default is -1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含隱藏欄位。Includes hidden fields. 使用 以排除隱藏欄位。Use to exclude hidden fields. 執行查詢，不會傳回資料列之後,傳回 0。After you execute a query that does not return rows, returns 0.

exception.span: 沒有對資料來源的目前連接。

span.span: There is no current connection to a data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 轉換會依據的基礎功能的 ODBC 驅動程式所執行。Conversions are performed based on the underlying capabilities of the ODBC driver. 如果不支援的轉換方法呼叫將會失敗。If the conversion is not supported then the method call will fail. 呼叫呼叫這個方法之前尋找 null 值。Call to look for null values before calling this method.

param.name: i
param.span: 以零為基底的資料行序數。

span.span: The zero-based column ordinal.

param.name: dataIndex
param.span: 欄位內讀取作業開始之處的索引。

span.span: The index within the field where the read operation is to start.

param.name: buffer
param.span: 要將位元組資料流讀取到其中的緩衝區。

span.span: The buffer into which to read the stream of bytes.

param.name: bufferIndex
param.span: 「緩衝區」內的索引，會從此處開始寫入作業。

span.span: The index within the buffer where the write operation is to start.

param.name: length
param.span: 要讀取的位元組數。

span.span: The number of bytes to read.

summary.span: 從指定的資料行位移將位元組資料流做為陣列讀入緩衝區，開始於特定的緩衝區位移。

span.span: Reads a stream of bytes from the specified column offset into the buffer as an array, starting at the particular buffer offset.

returns.span: 讀取的實際位元組數目。

span.span: The actual number of bytes read.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在欄位中傳回可用位元組的數。 returns the number of available bytes in the field. 大部分的情況下這是欄位的確切的長度。Most of the time this is the exact length of the field. 不過，傳回的數字可能小於欄位的實際長度如果已經使用來取得位元組的欄位。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if has already been used to obtain bytes from the field. 這種情況下，比方說，如果可能讀入緩衝區的大型資料結構。This may be the case, for example, if the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱`SequentialAccess`設定。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 如果您傳遞 null 值的緩衝區傳回欄位的長度，以位元組為單位。If you pass a buffer that is a null value, returns the length of the field in bytes. 轉換會依據的基礎功能的 ODBC 驅動程式所執行。Conversions are performed based on the underlying capabilities of the ODBC driver. 如果不支援的轉換方法呼叫將會失敗。If the conversion is not supported then the method call will fail. > [!NOTE] > 如果，則擲回任何例外狀況的值`bufferIndex`超出陣列。No exception will be thrown if the value of `bufferIndex` is outside the array. 將讀取任何資料，則方法會傳回 0。No data will be read and the method will return 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在欄位中傳回可用字元的數。 returns the number of available characters in the field. 大部分的情況下這是欄位的確切的長度。Most of the time this is the exact length of the field. 不過，傳回的數字可能小於欄位的實際長度如果已經使用從欄位取得字元。However, the number returned may be less than the true length of the field if has already been used to obtain characters from the field. 這種情況下，比方說，如果可能讀入緩衝區的大型資料結構。This may be the case, for example, if the is reading a large data structure into a buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱`SequentialAccess`設定。For more information, see the `SequentialAccess` setting for . 如果您傳遞 null 值的緩衝區以字元為單位傳回欄位的長度。If you pass a buffer that is a null value, returns the length of the field in characters. 轉換會依據的基礎功能的 ODBC 驅動程式所執行。Conversions are performed based on the underlying capabilities of the ODBC driver. 如果不支援的轉換方法呼叫將會失敗。If the conversion is not supported then the method call will fail. > [!NOTE] > 如果，則擲回任何例外狀況的值`bufferIndex`超出陣列。No exception will be thrown if the value of `bufferIndex` is outside the array. 將讀取任何資料，則方法會傳回 0。No data will be read and the method will return 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次執行區分大小寫的查閱。 performs a case-sensitive lookup first. 如果失敗，進行第二個不區分大小寫的搜尋。If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made. 方法會擲回`IndexOutOfRange`例外狀況，如果找不到以零為起始的資料行序數。The method throws an `IndexOutOfRange` exception if the zero-based column ordinal is not found. 不會區分假名寬度。 is kana-width insensitive. 因為根據序數進行查閱比具名查閱更有效率，很效率不佳，呼叫在迴圈內。Because ordinal-based lookups are more efficient than named lookups, it is inefficient to call within a loop. 請改為呼叫一次，然後將結果指派給整數變數的使用在迴圈中的指派。Instead, call one time and then assign the results to an integer variable for use within the loop. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用 方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the method. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcDataReader.GetOrdinal/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Overrides Function GetSchemaTable () As DataTable
public: override System::Data::DataTable ^ GetSchemaTable();

summary.span: 傳回 ，以描述 的資料行中繼資料。

span.span: Returns a that describes the column metadata of the .

returns.span: 描述資料行中繼資料的 。

span.span: A that describes the column metadata.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法會傳回有關每個資料行的中繼資料以下列順序：The method returns metadata about each column in the following order: |DataReader 資料行DataReader column|描述Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |ColumnNameColumnName|資料行; 的名稱這可能不是唯一的。The name of the column; this might not be unique. 如果無法判別資料行名稱，則會傳回 null 值。If the column name cannot be determined, a null value is returned. 這個名稱一律會反映目前的檢視或命令文字中的資料行的最新命名。This name always reflects the most recent naming of the column in the current view or command text.| |ColumnOrdinalColumnOrdinal|資料行以零為起始的序數。The zero-based ordinal of the column. 此資料行不能包含 null 值。This column cannot contain a null value.| |ColumnSizeColumnSize|資料行中值的最大可能長度。The maximum possible length of a value in the column. 使用固定長度的資料類型的資料行，這是資料類型的大小。For columns that use a fixed-length data type, this is the size of the data type.| |NumericPrecisionNumericPrecision|如果是數值資料類型，這是資料行的最大有效位數。If is a numeric data type, this is the maximum precision of the column. 精確度取決於資料行的定義。The precision depends on the definition of the column. 如果不是數值資料類型，請勿使用此資料行中的資料。If is not a numeric data type, do not use the data in this column. 如果基礎的 ODBC 驅動程式會傳回非數值資料類型的精確度值，這個值會使用結構描述資料表中。If the underlying ODBC driver returns a precision value for a non-numeric data type, this value is used in the schema table.| |NumericScaleNumericScale|如果是，小數點右邊的位數。If is , the number of digits to the right of the decimal point. 否則，這會是 null 值。Otherwise, this is a null value. 如果基礎的 ODBC 驅動程式會傳回非數值資料類型的精確度值，這個值會使用結構描述資料表中。If the underlying ODBC driver returns a precision value for a non-numeric data type, this value is used in the schema table.| |DataTypeDataType|對應至 common language runtime 類型的。Maps to the common language runtime type of .| |提供者類型ProviderType|基礎的驅動程式類型。The underlying driver type.| |IsLongIsLong|`true` 如果資料行包含二進位長物件 (BLOB)，包含很長的資料。`true` if the column contains a Binary Long Object (BLOB) that contains very long data. 非常長資料的定義是特定驅動程式。The definition of very long data is driver-specific.| |AllowDBNullAllowDBNull|`true` 如果取用者可以設為 null 值的資料行，或驅動程式無法判斷取用者是否可以設定為 null 值的資料行。`true` if the consumer can set the column to a null value or if the driver cannot determine whether the consumer can set the column to a null value. 否則為 `false`。Otherwise, `false`. 資料行可以包含 null 值，即使它不能設為 null 的值。A column may contain null values, even if it cannot be set to a null value.| |IsReadOnlyIsReadOnly|`true` 如果無法修改資料行;否則`false`。`true` if the column cannot be modified; otherwise `false`.| |IsRowVersionIsRowVersion|如果資料行包含永續性資料列識別碼不能寫入，且除了識別資料列沒有有意義值，設定。Set if the column contains a persistent row identifier that cannot be written to, and has no meaningful value except to identity the row.| |IsUniqueIsUnique|`true`： 沒有基底資料表中的兩個資料列 （BaseTableName 中傳回的資料表） 可以在此資料行中具有相同的值。`true`: No two rows in the base table (the table returned in BaseTableName) can have the same value in this column. IsUnique 保證能夠`true`如果資料行代表本身的索引鍵或類型只適用於此資料行的 UNIQUE 條件約束。IsUnique is guaranteed to be `true` if the column represents a key by itself or if there is a constraint of type UNIQUE that applies only to this column.

`false`: 資料行可以包含基底資料表中重複的值。`false`: The column can contain duplicate values in the base table. 此資料行的預設值是`false`。The default for this column is `false`.| |IsKeyIsKey|`true`： 資料行是一組資料列集中的資料行的其中一個，結合在一起唯一識別資料列。`true`: The column is one of a set of columns in the rowset that, taken together, uniquely identify the row. 一組資料行的 IsKey 設`true`必須唯一識別資料列集中的資料列。The set of columns with IsKey set to `true` must uniquely identify a row in the rowset. 沒有這個資料行集是資料行的最小集合的需求。There is no requirement that this set of columns is a minimal set of columns. 這個資料行集可能會產生來自基底資料表主索引鍵、 唯一條件約束或唯一索引鍵。This set of columns may be generated from a base table primary key, a unique constraint, or a unique index.

`false`： 資料行不是需要唯一識別資料列。`false`: The column is not required to uniquely identify the row.| |IsAutoIncrementIsAutoIncrement|`true` 如果資料行將值指派給新的資料列，以固定遞增方式;否則`false`。`true` if the column assigns values to new rows in fixed increments; otherwise `false`. 此資料行的預設值是`false`。The default for this column is `false`.| |BaseSchemaNameBaseSchemaName|包含資料行的資料來源中的結構描述名稱。The name of the schema in the data source that contains the column. 如果無法判斷基底目錄名稱，則為 NULL。NULL if the base catalog name cannot be determined. 此資料行的預設值是 null 值。The default for this column is a null value.| |BaseCatalogNameBaseCatalogName|包含資料行的資料存放區中的類別目錄名稱。The name of the catalog in the data store that contains the column. 如果無法判斷基底目錄名稱，則為 NULL。NULL if the base catalog name cannot be determined. 此資料行的預設值是 null 值。The default for this column is a null value.| |BaseTableNameBaseTableName|資料表或檢視中包含資料行的資料存放區的名稱。The name of the table or view in the data store that contains the column. 如果無法判斷基底資料表名稱，則為 null 值。A null value if the base table name cannot be determined. 此資料行的預設值為 null 的值。The default of this column is a null value.| |BaseColumnNameBaseColumnName|在資料存放區中的資料行名稱。The name of the column in the data store. 這可能是如果原先使用別名 ColumnName 資料行中傳回的資料行名稱不同。This might be different from the column name returned in the ColumnName column if an alias was used. 如果無法判斷基底的資料行名稱，或如果資料列集資料行衍生而來但不是完全相同，資料中的資料行存放區，則為 null 值。A null value if the base column name cannot be determined or if the rowset column is derived, but not identical to, a column in the data store. 此資料行的預設值是 null 值。The default for this column is a null value.| 在結果集中的每個資料行都會傳回一個資料列。A row is returned for every column in the results set. .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC 會假設中繼資料資訊是來自 ODBC 驅動程式，其中**SQLPrepare**， **SQLExecute**，或**SQLExecuteDirect**函式的呼叫。The .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC assumes that metadata information is available from an ODBC driver after one of **SQLPrepare**, **SQLExecute**, or **SQLExecuteDirect** functions are called. 「 SchemaOnly 」 的命令行為正常運作， **SQLPrepare**必須傳回必要的中繼資料資訊。For "SchemaOnly" command behavior to work correctly, **SQLPrepare** must return the required metadata information. 並非所有的 ODBC 驅動程式支援這項功能，或傳回中繼資料資訊。Not all ODBC drivers support this function or return metadata information. 在這些情況下，部分或全部 SchemaTable 中的資訊將會遺失。In these cases, part or all of the information in the SchemaTable will be missing. 在呼叫**SQLPrepare**，資料提供者會呼叫 ODBC **SQLColAttribute**函數來尋找查詢結果 （例如 IsLong、 IsUnique，每個資料行的相關中繼資料資訊AllowDBNull，BaseTableName，BaseColumnName)。After calling **SQLPrepare**, The data provider calls the ODBC **SQLColAttribute** function to find the metadata information related to each column in the query results (for example, IsLong, IsUnique, AllowDBNull, BaseTableName, BaseColumnName). 如果基礎驅動程式不會傳回此資訊的某些部分，不會正確設定 SchemaTable 中的對應值。If the underlying driver does not return some of this information, the corresponding values in the SchemaTable will not be set correctly. .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC 也會呼叫**SQLPrimaryKeys**擷取每個資料表的索引鍵資訊。The .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC also calls **SQLPrimaryKeys** to retrieve the key information for every table. 如果基礎的 ODBC 驅動程式不支援此函式，此資料提供者會呼叫**SQLStatistics**並選擇其中一個唯一索引作為資料表的主索引鍵。If the underlying ODBC driver does not support this function, the data provider calls **SQLStatistics** and chooses one of the unique indexes as the primary key for the table. 這可能不會永遠提供您想要的結果。This may not always give the results that you want. 需要正確識別之資料表的主索引鍵，才能正確運作。 needs the correct identification of the primary keys of the table in order to work correctly. 如果 BaseTableName 沒有傳回每個資料行在查詢結果中，.NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC 會嘗試剖析 SQL 陳述式，以尋找查詢所涉及的資料表名稱。If the BaseTableName is not returned for every column in the query results, the .NET Framework Data Provider for ODBC tries to parse the SQL statement to find the table names involved in the query. 這適用於使用更新、 插入、 刪除和簡單的 SELECT 陳述式，而非預存程序或聯結為基礎的 SELECT 陳述式。This works with UPDATE, INSERT, DELETE and simple SELECT statements, but not with stored procedures or SELECT statements based on joins. 如果從這個表中的部分或所有的結構描述資訊遺漏將無法正常運作，因為它有足夠的結構描述資訊，以自動產生正確的 INSERT、 UPDATE 或 DELETE 陳述式。If some or all the schema information is missing from this table, the will not work correctly, because it has insufficient schema information to automatically generate the correct INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements. 若要確定中繼資料行傳回正確的資訊，您必須呼叫與設為 KeyInfo 行為參數。To make sure that metadata columns return the correct information, you must call with the behavior parameter set to KeyInfo. 否則，有些結構描述資料表中的資料行可能會傳回預設值，null 或不正確的資料。Otherwise, some of the columns in the schema table may return default, null, or incorrect data. 當您使用 oracle 的 ODBC.NET 透過 ODBC 驅動程式時，做為索引鍵無法辨識別名的索引鍵資料行。When you use ODBC.NET to Oracle via the ODBC driver, aliased key columns are not recognized as keys. 這會影響 OdbcDataReader 的結構描述資料表中的 IsKey 和 IsUnique 資料行。This affects the IsKey and IsUnique columns in the schema table of the OdbcDataReader. 它也會影響產生更新邏輯 OdbcCommandBuilder 的能力。It also affects the OdbcCommandBuilder's ability to generate updating logic. 請考慮不使用主索引鍵資料行的別名。Consider not using an alias for a primary key column. > [!NOTE] > Microsoft Jet ODBC 驅動程式一律會傳回唯一索引和主索引鍵資料行，為可為 null，不論是否可為 null 或不。The Microsoft Jet ODBC driver always returns unique index and primary key columns as nullable regardless of whether they are nullable or not. 驅動程式也不會傳回主索引鍵的資訊。它只傳回唯一索引和資料行中，包括主索引鍵資料行，而不管它們之間的清單。The driver also does not return primary key information; it only returns a list of unique indexes and their columns, including primary key columns, without differentiating among them.

param.name: values

remarks.format: ## Remarks 對於大部分的應用程式，方法提供有效率的方法用來擷取所有資料行，而不是個別擷取每個資料行。For most applications, the method provides an efficient means for retrieving all columns, instead of retrieving each column individually. 您可以傳遞陣列包含少於一個產生的資料列中所包含的資料行數目。You can pass an array that contains fewer than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row. 資料量陣列，含有複製到陣列。Only the amount of data the array holds is copied to the array. 您也可以傳遞陣列的長度大於包含在產生的資料列中的資料行數目。You can also pass an array whose length is more than the number of columns that are contained in the resulting row. 對於 null 資料庫資料行來說，這個方法會傳回 。This method returns for null database columns. ## Examples [!code-csharp[OdbcDataReader_GetValues#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/odbcdatareader_getvalues/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[OdbcDataReader_GetValues#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/odbcdatareader_getvalues/vb/source.vb#1)]

param.name: i

summary.span: 取得值，這個值表示資料行是否包含不存在或遺漏的值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要避免引發錯誤，呼叫這個方法來尋找 null 資料行值，然後再呼叫的型別有 Get 的方法 (例如， ，等等)。To avoid raising an error, call this method to look for null column values before calling the typed Get methods (for example, , , and so on).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 第一次執行區分大小寫的查閱。A case-sensitive lookup is performed first. 如果失敗，進行第二個不區分大小寫的搜尋。If it fails, a second case-insensitive search is made. 這個方法是區分假名寬度。This method is kana-width insensitive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 預設位置是第一個資料錄之前。The default position of the is before the first record. 因此，您必須呼叫開始存取任何資料。Therefore, you must call to start accessing any data. 雖然正在使用中，相關聯正忙於處理直到您呼叫。While the is being used, the associated is busy serving it until you call . ## Examples 下列範例會建立、 ，和。The following example creates an , an , and an . 此範例會讀取整個資料，並將它寫出至主控台。The example reads through the data, writing it out to the console. 最後，範例會關閉，然後。Finally, the example closes the , and then the . summary.span: 取得因執行 SQL 陳述式所變更、插入或刪除的資料列數目。

span.span: Gets the number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted by execution of the SQL statement.

value.span: 已變更、插入或刪除的資料列數。

span.span: The number of rows changed, inserted, or deleted.

value.span: SELECT 陳述式的值為 -1，如果沒有任何資料列受到影響，或是陳述式失敗，則為 0。

span.span: -1 for SELECT statements; 0 if no rows were affected, or the statement failed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 直到讀取所有資料列，而且您關閉屬性未設定。The property is not set until all rows are read and you close the . 這個屬性的值是累計的。The value of this property is cumulative. 例如，如果兩筆記錄會在批次模式中，值插入將會是 2。For example, if two records are inserted in batch mode, the value of will be 2. 和屬性之後，您可以呼叫已關閉。 and are the only properties that you can call after the is closed.
